channel.title: How to make a client connect to a specific ip?
channel.description: Im really stuck right now, i have the menno's client and im trying to get it to connect to my server but i cannot find were to input my ip so it will connect. I have the gui.java but i cannot find where to input the IP. Can someone guide me please?

item.title: How to make a client connect to a specific ip?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

I didn’t fully understand the question, are you trying to get it to automatically load the IP, or are you trying to hide the IP bar so it has an unchangable IP?

item.title: How to make a client connect to a specific ip?
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“powerknite7, post:2, topic:276758”]1. this is wrong selection
2. go to gui.java
3. control +f seartch for server
4. keep entering til you see somthing like .no-ip.biz ,…
5. change to your ip (no-ip) good luck .[/quote]Wow, and you’re telling me to stop posting stuff that doesn’t help…

item.title: How to make a client connect to a specific ip?
item.dc:creator: @nsteger123 nsteger123
item.description:
@nsteger123 wrote:

Sorry, i still cannot get it. This is what i find

String s1 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, (new StringBuilder()).append("Current server: "+ serverip), "undetainable.no-ip.biz", 3); if(s1 == null)

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Server ip")) { try { String sServer = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, "Server IP #:"); Serverip = sServer; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(sServer)); } catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace();

Sorry but can someone try to get the client and help? It was mennos client

item.title: How to make a client connect to a specific ip?
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

  1. this is wrong selection
  2. go to gui.java
  3. control +f seartch for server
  4. keep entering til you see somthing like .no-ip.biz ,…
  5. change to your ip (no-ip) good luck .
